          <title>
            <string language="it">Mezzi di pagamento</string>
            <string language="en">Means of Payment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlungsmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modes de paiement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meios de pagamento</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Medios del pago</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli studenti possono imparare di più sulle valute che si usano in Europa - all'interno e all'esterno dell'Unione.</string>
            <string language="en">Students can learn more about currencies which are used in Europe - within and outside the EU.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Valute europee</string>
            <string language="en">European currencies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">valuta</string>
            <string language="en">currency</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">stati membri dell'UE</string>
            <string language="en">EU member states</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">stati non membri dell'UE</string>
            <string language="en">non-member states</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Stati candidati all'UE</string>
            <string language="en">EU candidate countries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">mezzi di pagamento</string>
            <string language="en">means of payment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können mehr über Währungen 
erlernen, deren in Europa - innerhalb und außerhalb des EUS verwendet
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent apprendre plus au sujet 
des devises dans lesquelles sont utilisés en Europe - et en dehors de
l'EU.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem aprender mais sobre as moedas
correntes de que são usados em Europa - dentro e fora do EU.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να μάθουν περισσότερων για τα 
νομίσματα που χρησιμοποιούνται στην Ευρώπη - εντός και έξω από 
της ΕΕ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes pueden aprender más sobre las 
modernidades dentro de las cuales se utilizan en Europa - y fuera del 
EU.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Lasciate che gli studenti esplorino le valute dell'Europa. Dopo aver studiato il testo nelle varie sezioni, essi dovrebbero facilmente essere in grado di risolvere l'esercizio nella webquest.</string>
            <string language="en">Let students explore the currencies of Europe. After havind studied the texts in the various sections, they should easily be able to solve the exercises in the webquest.</string>
